Headline: Temporary Reroute
ShortDescription: #126 Jackson buses are temporarily rerouted via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and into the terminal, due to a festival near Jackson/Central.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Buses will operate in both directions via Jackson, Central, Harrison, and then into the terminal.

Allow extra travel time.

 

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to Fiesta Boricua.

Headline: No trains at Forest Park
ShortDescription: Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended at Forest Park due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line service has been temporarily suspended at Forest Park due to police activity.

As a result, trains are operating only between O'Hare and Harlem (Forest Park Branch) at this time.

Shuttle buses are available between Forest Park and Harlem (Forest Park Branch).

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines. These may include: #7 Harrison, #50 Damen, or the #49 Western bus. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Normal Yellow Line Service Being Restored
ShortDescription: Some Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier signal problems at Howard. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Yellow Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier signal problems at Howard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are now moving and service is resuming; allow extra travel time.

ShortDescription: Some Purple Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier signal problems at Howard. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Some Purple Line trains are running with residual delays after earlier signal problems at Howard.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.
